content: the small talk shawl is a top down shawl that is not a triangle and sits well on the shoulders it is composed of leaves a modified center point and can be made to any size desired i chose to use a sock yarn but it can be done in any weight with appropriate hook the pattern has written directions and hand drawn charts i have tried to make the charts easy to read but please feel free to contact me if you have any questions it has been tested but if any errors are found please let me know errata row four of edging beg shell * chain 5 single_crochet in chain 5 loop twice chain 5 double_crochet in next 2 stitches chain 3 double_crochet in next 2 stitches 3 double_crochet in chain 1 space double_crochet in next 2 stitches chain 3 double_crochet in next 2 stitches * i will try to get that fixed here shortly 1-13-2010 uploaded new pdf with corrections 1-14-2010 chart added to the heavier edging instructions
